activities: TSI receives personal Employee Data regarding employees of its EU subsidiaries for the purposes of (a) general employment purposes including providing compensation benefits and related services, keeping updated organizational information, making employment-related decisions, and employee training, (b) facilitating company business by publishing email, phone, and identification information, and (c) processing and investigating reports under TSI’s various compliance programs.
industrysector: General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)General Science & Technology - (GST)Laboratory Scientific Instruments - (LAB)
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs); For all other types of data: International Centre for Dispute Resolution (AAA/ICDR)
